Translations.Text: So do not be in any doubt as to what these serve. They only serve as their fathers served in the past, and We certainly pay them back their portion without any reduction

And We have certainly given Moses the book, then they disagreed about it, and if it was not for a word that previously came from your Master, it would have been judged between them, and they are indeed in serious doubt about it
And your Master shall pay them all back for their actions. Indeed He is well informed of what they do
So, you and those who repented with you persevere as you are ordered and do not rebel, indeed He sees what you do
And do not lean toward those who did wrong, otherwise the fire touches you, and there is no protector for you other than God, then you are not helped
And perform the mandatory prayer at the two ends of the day and early part of the night. Indeed the good deeds eliminate the bad deeds. This is a reminder to the mindful
And persevere (and be patient), for God does not waste the reward of the good doers

Why there were not men of insight among the generations before you to prohibit from the corruption in the earth, except a few of those whom We saved among them? And those who did wrong followed what they took pleasure in it, and they were guilty
And it is not for your Master to destroy any town unjustly while its people are reformers
